summary: A Korean emigrant's superstitiously suspicious past starts to catch up with her as her obsession with her married American neighbors begins to twist out of control and off the deep end.
cast: Hye-Kyo Song|Arno Frisch|Athena Currey|June Kyoto Lu|Rob Yang|Clarissa Park|Marcus Choi|Carly Maitlin|Constance Boardman|Mi Sun Choi|Chuja Seo|Eugene Om|Robin Martin|Yeon Soo Kim|Chu Dae Ok|Que Y. Chung|Kyung Cha Hong|Julie Park|Sue Kyung Cho|Yung Sue Choi|Jason Paige|Luther Creek|Eve Annenberg|Dominic Marcus|Sean Meenan|Karen Olivo|Till Wolter
title: Fetish
